question: Joshua was a pen pal with 10 people. He stopped being penpals with 2 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 7 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 9 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Joshua is penpals with 10-2=<<10-2=8>>8 people
Thus he gets 8*4=<<8*4=32>>32 letters a week
So he writes 32*7=<<32*7=224>>224 pages a week
So he writes for 224*9=<<224*9=2016>>2016 minutes a week
So he writes 2016/60=<<2016/60=33>>33 hours a week
#### 33
